definition[0]: a list that young children learn, in which all the numbers between 1 and 12 are multiplied by each other
example[0]: He’s 12 years old and still doesn’t know his three times table.
definition[1]: a list, used especially by children in school, that shows the results when each number between one and twelve is multiplied by each number between one and twelve
example[1]: Do you know the eleven times table?
